item.description:
just an update...

Jokers in Dracut does not serve food, but they said we are welcome to bring/share in the potluck meal that everyone is bringing.  It starts at 3pm so I have decided to go there for 3pm, in case it starts snowing earlier, and I'll split when the snow gets bad.

there is a band that will be playing off and on during the six hour interval (3-9pm)

The $10 admission for a ticket is for the families who's kids got hurt in the the Pelham, NH accident on July 4th.  if people can't make the event but would like to help out...you may send a check payable to Linda Doherty, % Susan Tisbert, PO BOX 793, Pelham, NH.  Thanks

and see below...

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Benefit for some cute little kids...
